trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Manheim
There were no other sightings in Manheim on or around November 19th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsMy son and I were traveling East towards Lititz Pa when we saw what we though was a hot air balloon in the distance. When we looked closer it was not But was the shape of a Balloon on top of another. It was light dull grey in appearance. We continued to watch from our car for a few minutes while driving. It was hovering and stationary. I than pulled over and parked my car to watch and it was gone. There was a steam trail straight up into the sky. Like what would be behind a jet. The trail went straight up until we couldn't see the end of it. We continued about what we were doing and later when we were leaving our destination approximately 5:00 we were traveling north and spotted lights in the sky the same shape as what the object was. When returning home we saw 2 of these lights. One to the SE and one to the West of our front porch. It was than dark and they appeared as stars. But shaped differently. I continue to keep my eye on them. About 7:00 I went outside with binoculars to see them better. The object to the West of me started to move sideways rapidly. I called my 14 yr old son out and he watched with me. The object was gone in a few seconds. I watched the one to the SE of us. It appeared to move west at a very slow rate. By morning they were gone. I did send another report seeing the same objects on 11-31-11
